message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to give you a 25% discount if you buy it now. If you don't buy it, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on a great opportunity.
I'll take the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'm only paying the discounted price of $75, considering the 25% discount you offered.

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this one is not as good. I'm still offering it to you for $100, but I'll throw in a free accessory that's worth $20. It's a great value, and I think you'll still find it useful.
I'm not interested in the current product, even with the free accessory. I'm not willing to pay $100 for a low-quality product.

I understand your concerns about the last product, but I assure you this one is a gem. I'm not convinced by your bold claim, and the money-back guarantee doesn't change my assessment of the product's value. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're being cautious, and I respect that. I'm willing to consider the third-party testing report, and the 95% rating is impressive. I'll take the product, but I'll pay the full price of $100, since the report suggests it's a high-quality product.

I'm glad you were impressed by the report! This is a $50 value, but I'll include it for free if you buy this product now.
I appreciate the added value, and the personalized setup and training session sounds like a great bonus. I'll take the product and the free service.

I'm glad you appreciated the offer. Unfortunately, this product is not as good as the last one. I'm being completely transparent with you - it's a low-quality product.
